1234.opensslcnf:
[ server_cert_extensions ]
basicConstraints                        = CA:FALSE
nsCertType                              = server
subjectKeyIdentifier                    = hash
authorityKeyIdentifier                  = keyid,issuer:always
issuerAltName                           = issuer:copy

[ req ]
default_bits                            = 4096
default_days                            = 730                           # how long to certify for
distinguished_name                      = req_distinguished_name
encrypt_key                             = no
string_mask                             = nombstr
req_extensions                          = v3_req                        # Extensions to add to certificate request
x509_extensions                         = v3_ca                         # The extentions to add to self signed certs

[ req_distinguished_name ]
commonName                              = Common Name (eg, YOUR name)
commonName_max                          = 64
commonName_default                      = www.irgendwas.test.fau.de
emailAddress                            = Email Address
emailAddress_max                        = 64
emailAddress_default                    = webmaster@fau.de



countryName                             = Country Name (2 letter code)
countryName_default                     = DE
countryName_min                         = 2
countryName_max                         = 2

stateOrProvinceName                     = State or Province Name (full name)
stateOrProvinceName_default             = Bayern
localityName                            = Locality Name (eg, city)
localityName_default                    = Erlangen
0.organizationName                      = Organization Name (eg, company)
0.organizationName_default              = Friedrich-Alexander-Universitaet Erlangen-Nuernberg
organizationalUnitName                  = Organizational Unit Name (eg, section)
organizationalUnitName_default          = Regionales Rechenzentrum Erlangen (RRZE)

[ policy_anything ]
countryName                             = optional
stateOrProvinceName                     = optional
localityName                            = optional
organizationName                        = optional
organizationalUnitName                  = optional
commonName                              = supplied
emailAddress                            = optional

####################################################################
# Extensions to use when signing a CA
[ v3_ca ]
subjectKeyIdentifier                    = hash
authorityKeyIdentifier                  = keyid:always,issuer:always
basicConstraints                        = CA:true
subjectAltName=email:move

####################################################################
# Same as above, but CA req already has SubjectAltNames
[ v3_ca_has_san ]
subjectKeyIdentifier			= hash
authorityKeyIdentifier			= keyid:always,issuer:always
basicConstraints			= CA:true

[ webteampolicy ]
policyIdentifier			= 1.3.1.1.1.1
CPS.1					= "https://www.rrze.fau.de/serverdienste/zertifikate/"

[ v3_req ]
basicConstraints			= CA:FALSE
keyUsage				= nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
certificatePolicies			= ia5org, @webteampolicy

# -------------- BEGIN Domain specific  -----
[ v3_req ]
subjectAltName                          = @SUBJ

[SUBJ]
DNS.0=irgendwas.test.fau.de
DNS.1=irgendwas.test.uni-erlangen.de
DNS.2=www.irgendwas.test.fau.de
DNS.3=www.irgendwas.test.uni-erlangen.de

# -------------- END domain specific openssl.cnf -----
